title: Framerate Drops after 7.1 Patch
body:
Since the 7.1 patch I have been experiencing serious FPS drops throughout all of my games.  I normally cap my FPS at 60 and it will stay there for my entire game.  After the new patch though my FPS frequently drops to 15-20fps.  It makes the game unplayable as it looks more like a slideshow than a video game.

I have tried all of the normal suggestions: updating my drivers, uninstalling the game, lowering all of my graphics settings.  Nothing has helped fix this problem so far.  I tried windowed and borderless options and neither of those could change the frequent drops I was getting.  

It is unfortunate but I won't be able to play the game until a fix is found for this as it is very unenjoyable to lose fights/games because of a massive fps loss.  I am almost positive it is nothing to do with my machine as I have tried all of the usual fixes and have never experienced this issue with League before.

replies.body:
I'm glad to hear you've already tried some good basics steps to troubleshoot this on your own. Poor FPS can caused by a few different things and since you've already updated your display driver, I'd say our [**FPS Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) may be the best option at this point. You can skip the steps you've already tried at this point, but you'll want to try the rest to ensure this cannot be easily resolved by working through your windows power settings are background apps.

Let me know if this caused any observable change.

Thank you for your response Targons Blade.  I viewed the FPS Guide you linked and tried the suggestions.  Defragged my PC, cleaned my registry, tried turning off game sounds, and turned off all of Windows background options that may be dragging on performance.  None of these made lasting impacts on the FPS drops I've been experiencing.  I still have frequent drops to 20fps and even lower during teamfights.  

I even tried all of these suggestions simultaneously while lowering the graphics options on my computer and it was not effective. 

I can post the specs from the diagnostics tests that are linked at the bottom of the guide if necessary.

Before we take a look at your logs, I wanted to make sure you weren't using the new *Crest of the Rooster* Ward Skin. Some players have been reporting their FPS deteriorates over the course of the game, especially after the 15:00 mark while using this ward skin, but do not experience issues while not using the ward skin.

Let me know if this was affecting you.
I am not using that specific ward skin.  In most of my games I use the Dragonslayer ward skin and sometimes the spider one (can't remember specific name).

Gotcha. Since you're still having issues, I'd like to escalate this to our tech team. I recommend running some system logs with our [**Hextech Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) request. One of our techs will reach back out shortly after you've submitted your ticket.

If you have any other questions, let me know.

my entire team had this problem and some of the enemy team too( perhaps all of them, not all of them /all'd). restarting the client seems to fix the problem temporarily. my fps is usually capped at 144 but i found my self playing the game at solid 26fps and dropping to 20fps in teamfights . it is without doubt not the fault of my pc as i have a high end pc. and this has only during this patch.

I'm sorry to hear that you are experiencing this problem as well.  I am glad to hear though that you have a high end PC and do not believe that your PC is the cause of this issue.  I have never had these framerate issues before this patch and I believe that the new patch is what is causing this issue.  Let me know if you hear of any fixes or suggestions for the issue, and I will do the same.
Do you solve it ? I have the same problem, I will say if i find how to solve it !
I haven't found a way to solve it yet.  Targons Blade has responded to this post several times and I'm hoping he can help us work towards a solution.
Thank you for the suggestion, but that did not solve it.  I was still experiencing severe FPS drops
